frontmatter.name: swCloseReopenOption_e
frontmatter.description: File close and reopen options. Bitmask.

title: swCloseReopenOption_e
description: File close and reopen options. Bitmask.

values.description: or 0x2; include this option to discard any changes to the document before reopening it; if you exclude this option and there are changes, ISldWorks::CloseAndReopen fails and returns swCloseReopenError_e.swCloseReopenModifiedError
or 0x8; include this option to reopen model drawings as resolved; if excluded by ISldWorks::CloseAndReopen2, keeps a model drawing in detailing mode on reopen
or 0x4; include this option to open the same sheet that was active during closing
or 0x1; include this option to open the drawing document in read-only mode
